title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 ยง 526.4 - Purchaser
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 ยง 526.4 - Purchaser

State Regulations

Tax Law, ยง 1101(b)(2)

The word
purchaser
means a person who
purchases tangible personal property or to whom services are rendered, the
receipts from which are subject to the sales or use tax. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20
ยง
526.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
